verses.verse: For <S%H113><s%>, behold, the Lord, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, does take away <S%H5493><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and from Judah <S%H3063><s%> the supply <S%H4937><s%> and the staff <S%H4938><s%>, the whole supply <S%H4937><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and the whole <S%H3605><s%> supply <S%H4937><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>,
The mighty man <S%H1368><s%>, and the man <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, the judge <S%H8199><s%>, and the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, and the prudent <S%H7080><s%>, and the ancient <S%H2205><s%>,

The captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%>, and the honorable <S%H5375><s%> man <S%H6440><s%>, and the counselor <S%H3289><s%>, and the skillful <S%H2450><s%> artificer <S%H2791><s%>, and the eloquent <S%H995><s%> orator <S%H3908><s%>.
And I will give <S%H5414><s%> sons <S%H5288><s%> to be their princes <S%H8269><s%>, and babes <S%H8586><s%> shall rule over them <S%H4910><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> shall be oppressed <S%H5065><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> by another <S%H376><s%>, and every one <S%H376><s%> by his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>: the child <S%H5288><s%> shall behave himself proudly <S%H7292><s%> against the ancient <S%H2205><s%>, and the base <S%H7034><s%> against the honorable <S%H3513><s%>.

When a man <S%H376><s%> shall take hold <S%H8610><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, saying <S%H8071><s%>, You have clothing, be you our ruler <S%H7101><s%>, and let this ruin <S%H4384><s%> be under your hand <S%H3027><s%>:

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall he swear <S%H5375><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I will not be a healer <S%H2280><s%>; for in my house <S%H1004><s%> is neither bread <S%H3899><s%> nor clothing <S%H8071><s%>: make <S%H7760><s%> me not a ruler <S%H7101><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

For Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is ruined <S%H3782><s%>, and Judah <S%H3063><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%>: because their tongue <S%H3956><s%> and their doings <S%H4611><s%> are against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to provoke <S%H4784><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his glory <S%H3519><s%>.

The show <S%H1971><s%> of their favor <S%H6440><s%> does witness against them <S%H6030><s%>; and they declare <S%H5046><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> as Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, they hide <S%H3582><s%> it not <S%H188><s%>. Woe unto their soul <S%H5315><s%>! for they have rewarded <S%H1580><s%> evil unto themselves <S%H7451><s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> you to the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, that it shall be well <S%H2896><s%> with him <S%H398><s%>: for they shall eat the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their doings <S%H4611><s%>.
Woe <S%H188><s%> unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>! it shall be ill <S%H7451><s%> with him <S%H1576><s%>: for the doing of his hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be done to him <S%H6213><s%>.

As for my people <S%H5971><s%>, sons <S%H5953><s%> are their oppressors <S%H5065><s%>, and women <S%H802><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> over them <S%H5971><s%>. O my people, they which lead <S%H833><s%> you cause you to err <S%H8582><s%>, and destroy <S%H1104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of your paths <S%H734><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> stands up <S%H5324><s%> to plead <S%H7378><s%>, and stands <S%H5975><s%> to judge <S%H1777><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will enter <S%H935><s%> into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with the ancients <S%H2205><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> there <S%H1197><s%>: for you have eaten up the vineyard <S%H3754><s%>; the plunder <S%H1500><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> is in your houses <S%H1004><s%>.

What do you mean that you beat <S%H1792><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> to pieces <S%H1792><s%>, and grind <S%H2912><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%>? says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Moreover the Lord <S%H3068><s%> says <S%H559><s%>, Because <S%H3282><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> are haughty <S%H1361><s%>, and walk <S%H3212><s%> with stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> necks <S%H1627><s%> and wanton <S%H8265><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>, walking <S%H1980><s%> and mincing <S%H2952><s%> as they go <S%H3212><s%>, and making a tinkling <S%H5913><s%> with their feet <S%H7272><s%>:

Therefore the Lord <S%H136><s%> will strike with a scab <S%H5596><s%> the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will discover <S%H6168><s%> their secret parts <S%H6596><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> will take away <S%H5493><s%> the beauty <S%H8597><s%> of their tinkling ornaments <S%H5914><s%> about their feet <S%H7636><s%>, and their hairnets, and their round necklaces like the moon <S%H7720><s%>,
The pendants <S%H5188><s%>, and the bracelets <S%H8285><s%>, and the veils <S%H7479><s%>,
The bonnets <S%H6287><s%>, and the chains of the ankles <S%H6807><s%>, and the headbands <S%H7196><s%>, and the perfumes <S%H5315><s%>, and the earrings <S%H3908><s%>,
The rings <S%H2885><s%>, and nose <S%H639><s%> jewels <S%H5141><s%>,
The changeable suits of apparel <S%H4254><s%>, and the capes <S%H4595><s%>, and the wide cloaks <S%H4304><s%>, and the handbags <S%H2754><s%>,
The mirrors <S%H1549><s%>, and the fine linen <S%H5466><s%>, and the tiaras <S%H6797><s%>, and the veils <S%H7289><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H1314><s%>, that instead of sweet smell, there shall be stink <S%H4716><s%>; and instead of a belt <S%H2290><s%>, a rope <S%H5364><s%>; and instead of well set <S%H4639><s%> hair <S%H4748><s%>, baldness <S%H7144><s%>; and instead of a robe <S%H6614><s%>, a girding <S%H4228><s%> of sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>; and burning <S%H3587><s%> instead of beauty <S%H3308><s%>.
Your men <S%H4962><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and your mighty <S%H1369><s%> in the war <S%H4421><s%>.
And her gates <S%H6607><s%> shall lament <S%H578><s%> and mourn <S%H56><s%>; and she being desolate <S%H5352><s%> shall sit <S%H3427><s%> upon the ground <S%H776><s%>.
